supervision.title: Project Supervision
supervision.intro1: We offer a comprehensive project supervision service to ensure your work is executed according to plans, specifications and established timelines. Our professional team reviews material quality, coordinates contractors, supervises installations and delivers periodic reports so you maintain full control of progress and budget.
supervision.intro2: We adapt supervision to projects of any scale: from targeted renovations to full construction projects. We work with transparent schedules, quality controls and a focus on cost optimization without sacrificing construction experience.

inspections.title: Periodic inspections
inspections.desc: Scheduled visits to verify progress, quality and compliance with technical specifications.

coordination.title: Contractor coordination
coordination.desc: Management of subcontractors and suppliers to reduce delays and conflicts on site.

reports.title: Reports and budget control
reports.desc: Periodic reports with photos, milestones achieved and budget deviations.

step1.title: Initial survey
step1.desc: Review of plans and site conditions.

step2.title: Planning
step2.desc: We define milestones, resources and supervision schedule.

step4.title: Final report
step4.desc: Comprehensive document with execution analysis, closure photos, maintenance recommendations and formal project handover documentation.

q1.q: How long until I receive the first report?
q1.a: We usually send the first report within the first week of supervision.

q2.q: Can I hire supervision by phases?
q2.a: Yes, we offer phased plans or scope-based contracts according to your needs.

q3.q: Do you include material quality control?
q3.a: We perform on-site checks and basic tests; for advanced testing we coordinate with partner laboratories.

about.description1: CChang Constructora, a Cuban company with over 10 years of experience, specializes in projects for state institutions and private clients.
about.description2: With presence in multiple provinces. We have a highly qualified team that guarantees efficient executions and lasting construction solutions.
about.description3: Our portfolio reflects the commitment to national development and excellence in each project, building not only structures but also solid relationships with our clients.

consulting.title: Construction Consulting
consulting.subtitle: Specialized advice to optimize your construction project

whatIs.title: What is Construction Consulting?
whatIs.description1: Our construction consulting service offers specialized technical advice to ensure the success of your project. From initial planning to execution, our team of experts will guide you through each stage.
whatIs.description2: We analyze feasibility, optimize resources, manage risks, and ensure regulatory compliance, guaranteeing that your project is completed within the established budget and timeline.

costOptimization.title: Cost Optimization
costOptimization.description: We identify savings opportunities without compromising quality

technicalAdvice.title: Technical Advice
technicalAdvice.description: Specialized technical solutions for construction challenges

riskReduction.title: Risk Reduction
riskReduction.description: We minimize unforeseen events and ensure regulatory compliance

qualityAssurance.title: Quality Assurance
qualityAssurance.description: We ensure the highest standards in materials and execution

consulting.finalDescription: Trust our experience to transform your vision into a successful construction reality. Over 10 years in the sector back us.
